body: I hate my self for loving this so fucking much.
實在有點黑暗……我認可畫風但……題材我不行
Wouldve been better if its trans but sadly we cant ask for it so yeah... i liked it though

This is really hot but it's a bit too much. I understand how this would be normal in that world's setting but it still hurts me to read this, especially towards the end where you hope for even the slightest trace of kindness but no, you just get disappointed over and over again; it's pure evil and total disregard towards the life of those girls. It'd make me feel better if the girls were portrayed as horrible people but no they didn't even deserve to die. This shit really hurt.
They didn't even bother to bury them.

@Sodachioikura: Don't hold your breath. The events that unfold in this story are portrayed as the norm for that world rather then some random extreme event. Its basically that world's equivalent going down to a grocery store each year to get holiday feast supplies.
So facking dark :((((( I hope they will be killed soon

I like the slavery story and story only. This slavery comic book is too real for me, which make me think of the authentic slavery in human history. I feel the absurd and the unmindful brutality in this comic book. This comic book is an excellent hallucinatory realism comic.
Sadly too dark for me to enjoy. The art is quite fantasticc
So dark i find it hard to critic

I hope some good person will translate this beatiful piece of art
Becouse i don't know chinse (DUH)
